name: Core API Release 36.12.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you new features and improvements.

ADDED.text: Added CORS support for LoginRadius APIs with configurable AllowOriginHeaderValidation to enhance API security.
Six new APIs have been introduced to enhance webhook management capabilities, including setting custom headers, query parameters, and credentials.

IMPROVED.text: Access restriction now supports blacklisting and whitelisting simultaneously.
The prevent_webhook parameter can additionally be utilized as a query parameter to disable the triggering of the Webhook.
